data_source: Skyscanner Flight Costs via Browse Quotes
description: Dynamic flight pricing data for origin-destination pairs with seasonal and booking timing factors

pricing_factors.departure_location: Prices vary significantly by origin airport
pricing_factors.booking_advance: Earlier booking typically offers lower prices

schema.booking_advance_days: integer - Days between booking and travel
schema.currency: string - Original currency before EUR conversion
schema.last_updated: string - ISO datetime of last price check
